title: Change your Gmail language settings - Computer - Gmail Help
content: Stay on top of the new way to organize a space. Learn more about in-line threading. You can change the language you use to see Gmail, and use special keyboards to type in other languages.   You can type in languages like Hindi, Arabic, or Chinese using input tools, including special keyboards. There are different types of input tools for different languages. When you start a new email, you'll need to change the direction again. In the bottom left of the compose window, click Formatting options  Right-to-left. If you’re seeing letters from the wrong language in your emails, you’ll need to change a setting.
